import React from "react"; import { Nav, Navbar, NavDropdown } from "react-bootstrap"; import {useHistory,Link} from 'react-router-dom' import logo from '../assets/images/Logo.png' function NavLogin() { let history = useHistory() const logout = () =>{ localStorage.removeItem('JWTtoken') localStorage.removeItem('UserEmail') localStorage.removeItem('userID') history.push('/login') } return (
Home Create Post View Posts Account Logout
); } export default NavLogin;
